subject: Football
Hurricane Katrina
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Anthony Kap is an undersized but eager linebacker at South Plaquemines High, which was opened after Hurricane Katrina to educate students from Port Sulphur, La., and other devastated communities.
snippet: Anthony Kap is an undersized but eager linebacker at South Plaquemines High, which was opened after Hurricane Katrina to educate students from Port Sulphur, La., and other devastated communities.
